subject:
Rev 370: - moved ctdbd specific options to ctdbd.c from cmdline.c
	in http://samba.org/~tridge/ctdb
body:
------------------------------------------------------------
revno: 370
revision-id: tridge@samba.org-20070529024925-0rcoxtaqxwzinus1
parent: tridge@samba.org-20070529022621-6n8xveqo1t3s7kq8
committer: Andrew Tridgell 
branch nick: tridge
timestamp: Tue 2007-05-29 12:49:25 +1000
message:
  - moved ctdbd specific options to ctdbd.c from cmdline.c
  
  - allow a event script to be specified that will take IPs, release
    IPs, and handle recovery in system specific ways
  
  - redirect stderr in subcommands to the log
modified:
  common/cmdline.c               cmdline.c-20070416041216-w1zvz91bkdsgjckw-1
  common/ctdb.c                  ctdb.c-20061127094323-t50f58d65iaao5of-2
  direct/ctdbd.c                 ctdbd.c-20070411085044-dqmhr6mfeexnyt4m-1
  include/ctdb_private.h         ctdb_private.h-20061117234101-o3qt14umlg9en8z0-13
  takeover/ctdb_takeover.c       ctdb_takeover.c-20070525071636-a5n1ihghjtppy08r-2
  takeover/system.c              system.c-20070525071636-a5n1ihghjtppy08r-3
